headline: Marathon Petroleum vs Phillips 66: Which Refining Giant Wins as Energy Sector Dominates 2026?
summary: Marathon Petroleum (NYSE: MPC) and Phillips 66 (NYSE: PSX) just reported fourth-quarter earnings that underscore why refiners are riding the energy sector’s extraordinary run. With the Energy Select Sector SPDR Fund (NYSE: XLE) up 20.22% year-to-date while the S&P 500 sits near flat, independent refiners belong in the conversation alongside upstream producers. How the Quarter ... Marathon Petroleum vs Phillips 66: Which Refining Giant Wins as Energy Sector Dominates 2026?
